title: Manage a fleet of drones
text: Follow this step-by-step tutorial to see how resin.io can help you connect a fleet of Parrot drones to AWS IoT.

title: Environment monitoring with resin.io and 30MHz
text: Industrial monitoring company 30MHz uses resin.io to help customers manage remote sensors, and you can too!

title: Petrolog: remote oil well management
text: When your oil wells are spread across hundreds of miles, a fleet of cellular connected Raspberry Pis provides a big benefit.
